trans-unit.source: Provides colors used for Microsoft Office display elements.
An instance of this class is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable" /> class.
Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是核取按鈕時所使用漸層開始色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是核取按鈕時所使用之漸層的結束色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是核取按鈕時所使用漸層的中間色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color used when the button is checked.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是所使用的純色核取按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是搭配使用的框線色彩<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonCheckedHighlight" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientBegin" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientMiddle" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientEnd" /> colors.

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientBegin" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientMiddle" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientEnd" /> colors.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是搭配使用的框線色彩<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientBegin" />， <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientMiddle" />，和<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedGradientEnd" />色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是在按下按鈕時所使用的漸層開始色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是按下按鈕時所使用之漸層的結束色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> ，這是按下按鈕時所使用的漸層中間色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color used when the button is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color used when the button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是所使用的純色按下按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedHighlight" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedHighlight" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是搭配使用的框線色彩<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonPressedHighlight" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientBegin" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientMiddle" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientEnd" /> colors.

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientBegin" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientMiddle" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientEnd" /> colors.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是搭配使用的框線色彩<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientBegin" />， <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientMiddle" />，和<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedGradientEnd" />色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是選取按鈕時所使用漸層開始色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是選取按鈕時所使用之漸層的結束色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是選取按鈕時所使用漸層的中間色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color used when the button is selected.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color used when the button is selected.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是所使用的純色選取按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedHighlight" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedHighlight" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是搭配使用的框線色彩<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable.ButtonSelectedHighlight" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color to use when the button is checked and gradients are being used.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color to use when the button is checked and gradients are being used.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是要使用核取按鈕後所使用漸層純色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color to use when the button is checked and selected and gradients are being used.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color to use when the button is checked and selected and gradients are being used.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是色彩的純色和核取按鈕並選取所使用漸層時使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color to use when the button is checked and selected and gradients are being used.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color to use when the button is checked and selected and gradients are being used.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是色彩的純色和核取按鈕並選取所使用漸層時使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the color to use for shadow effects on the grip (move handle).
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color to use for shadow effects on the grip (move handle).
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是要用於 （移動控點） 的底框陰影效果的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the color to use for highlight effects on the grip (move handle).
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the color to use for highlight effects on the grip (move handle).
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> ，這是要用於 （移動控點） 的底框醒目提示效果色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是在影像邊界中所使用的漸層開始色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> 必須設定為`true`顯示這個色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是在影像邊界中所使用漸層的結束色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> 必須設定為`true`顯示這個色彩。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> 必須設定為`true`顯示這個色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> when an item is revealed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> when an item is revealed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是在影像邊界中所使用的漸層開始色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />時顯示項目。

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> when an item is revealed.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color that is the border color to use on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用上的框線色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border color to use with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the border color to use with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used when a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used when a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用時的最上層的漸層開始色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />按下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is pressed.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used when a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用最上層漸層的結束色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />按下。

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the middle color of the gradient used when a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用時的最上層的漸層中間色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />按下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the solid color to use when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> other than the top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is selected.

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the solid color to use when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> other than the top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是說時要使用純色<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />以外最上層<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />已選取。

trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是當使用的漸層開始色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />已選取。

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> background.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用中的漸層的結束色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets the middle color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> background.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the middle color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> background.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用中的漸層中間色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />背景。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the starting color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用中的漸層開始色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the end color of the gradient used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />也就是使用中的漸層的結束色彩<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" /> rather than colors that match the current visual style.
<see langword="true" /> to use <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要使用<see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles or themes are turned off, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> uses the colors in <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
trans-unit.target: 如果視覺化樣式或主題均已關閉，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>使用中的色彩<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>。
